title: When Life Gives You Lemons...
content:
The Wolf: Yeah, big surprise party. You know how to get there?

Boingo: Oh, yeah. In fact, I know a shortcut.

The Wolf: [to Twitchy] You hear that? He knows a shortcut.

The Wolf: You see, Twitchy? You get lemons, you make lemonade....

[Cuts to the Wolf and Twitchy trudging through a dark, flooded cave]

The Wolf: ....and then that lemonade turns bitter, ferments and turns to pig-swill. Never trust a bunny with directions, Twitchy.
